argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | qlift.1 | |- F = ran ( x e. X |-> <. [ x ] R , A >. ) |
| 2 |  | qlift.2 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> A e. Y ) |
| 3 |  | qlift.3 | |- ( ph -> R Er X ) |
| 4 |  | qlift.4 | |- ( ph -> X e. _V ) |
| 5 |  | #P_erex | |- ( R Er X -> ( X e. _V -> R e. _V ) ) |
| 6 | 3, 4, 5 | #P_sylc | |- ( ph -> R e. _V ) |
| 7 |  | #P_ecelqsg | |- ( ( R e. _V /\ x e. X ) -> [ x ] R e. ( X /. R ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> [ x ] R e. ( X /. R ) ) |
